verses.verse: <S%G1161>Now<s%> as to the <S%G5550>times<s%> and the <S%G2540>epochs,<s%> <S%G80>brethren,<s%> you <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G5532>need<s%> of anything to be <S%G1125>written<s%> to you.

For you <S%G846>yourselves<s%> <S%G3609>know<s%> <S%G199>full<s%> <S%G199>well<s%> that the <S%G2250>day<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> will <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G5613>just<s%> <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief<s%> in the <S%G3571>night.<s%>

<S%G3752>While<s%> they are <S%G3004>saying,<s%> <S%G1515>"Peace<s%> and <S%G803>safety!<s%>" <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G3639>destruction<s%> will <S%G2186>come<s%> upon them <S%G160>suddenly<s%> <S%G5618>like<s%> <S%G5604>birth<s%> <S%G5604>pangs<s%> upon a woman with <S%G1722>child<s%><S%G1064>;<s%> and they shall not <S%G1628>escape.<s%>
But you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> are not in <S%G4655>darkness,<s%> that the <S%G2250>day<s%> should <S%G2638>overtake<s%> you <S%G5613>like<s%> a <S%G2812>thief;<s%>
for you are <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G5457>light<s%> and <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2250>day.<s%> We are not of <S%G3571>night<s%> <S%G3761>nor<s%> of <S%G4655>darkness;<s%>
<S%G686>so<s%> <S%G686>then<s%> let us not <S%G2518>sleep<s%> as <S%G3062>others<s%> do, but let us be <S%G1127>alert<s%> and <S%G3525>sober.<s%>

For <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2518>sleep<s%> <S%G2518>do<s%> their <S%G2518>sleeping<s%> at <S%G3571>night,<s%> and <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G3182>get<s%> <S%G3182>drunk<s%> <S%G3184>get<s%> <S%G3184>drunk<s%> at <S%G3571>night.<s%>

But since we are of [the] <S%G2250>day,<s%> let us be <S%G3525>sober,<s%> having <S%G1746>put<s%> on the <S%G2382>breastplate<s%> of <S%G4102>faith<s%> and <S%G26>love,<s%> and as a <S%G4030>helmet,<s%> the <S%G1680>hope<s%> of <S%G4991>salvation.<s%>

For <S%G2316>God<s%> has not <S%G5087>destined<s%> us for <S%G3709>wrath,<s%> but for <S%G4047>obtaining<s%> <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
who <S%G599>died<s%> for us, that <S%G1535>whether<s%> we are <S%G1127>awake<s%> <S%G1535>or<s%> <S%G2518>asleep,<s%> we may <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G260>together<s%> with Him.

<S%G1352>Therefore<s%> <S%G3870>encourage<s%> <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another,<s%> and <S%G3618>build<s%> up <S%G1520>one<s%> <S%G1520>another,<s%> <S%G2531>just<s%> as you <S%G2532>also<s%> are <S%G4160>doing.<s%>

But we <S%G2065>request<s%> of you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> that you <S%G3609>appreciate<s%> <S%G3588>those<s%> who <S%G2872>diligently<s%> <S%G2872>labor<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> you, and <S%G4291>have<s%> <S%G4291>charge<s%> <S%G4291>over<s%> you in the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> and <S%G3560>give<s%> you <S%G3560>instruction,<s%>

and that you <S%G2233>esteem<s%> them <S%G5239>very<s%> <S%G5239>highly<s%> in <S%G26>love<s%> <S%G1223>because<s%> of their <S%G2041>work.<s%> <S%G1514>Live<s%> in <S%G1514>peace<s%> with <S%G1438>one<s%> <S%G1438>another.<s%>

And we <S%G3870>urge<s%> you, <S%G80>brethren,<s%> <S%G3560>admonish<s%> the <S%G813>unruly,<s%> <S%G3888>encourage<s%> the <S%G3642>fainthearted,<s%> <S%G472>help<s%> the <S%G772>weak,<s%> be <S%G3114>patient<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men.<s%>

<S%G3708>See<s%> that <S%G3361>no<s%> <S%G5100>one<s%> <S%G591>repays<s%> <S%G5100>another<s%> with <S%G2556>evil<s%> for <S%G2556>evil,<s%> but <S%G3842>always<s%> <S%G1377>seek<s%> <S%G1377>after<s%> that <S%G18>which<s%> is <S%G18>good<s%> for <S%G240>one<s%> <S%G240>another<s%> and for <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G3956>men.<s%>
<S%G5463>Rejoice<s%> <S%G3842>always;<s%>
<S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G89>without<s%> <S%G89>ceasing;<s%>
in <S%G3956>everything<s%> <S%G2168>give<s%> <S%G2168>thanks;<s%> for <S%G3778>this<s%> is God's <S%G2307>will<s%> for you in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>
Do not <S%G4570>quench<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>
do not <S%G1848>despise<s%> <S%G4394>prophetic<s%> <S%G4394>utterances.<s%>
But <S%G1381>examine<s%> <S%G3956>everything<s%> [carefully]; <S%G2722>hold<s%> <S%G2722>fast<s%> to that <S%G2570>which<s%> is <S%G2570>good;<s%>
<S%G568>abstain<s%> from <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G1491>form<s%> of <S%G4190>evil.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> may the <S%G2316>God<s%> of <S%G1515>peace<s%> <S%G846>Himself<s%> <S%G37>sanctify<s%> you <S%G3651>entirely;<s%> and may your <S%G4151>spirit<s%> and <S%G5590>soul<s%> and <S%G4983>body<s%> be <S%G5083>preserved<s%> <S%G3648>complete,<s%> <S%G274>without<s%> <S%G274>blame<s%> at the <S%G3952>coming<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ.<s%>
<S%G4103>Faithful<s%> is He who <S%G2564>calls<s%> you, and He <S%G2532>also<s%> will <S%G4160>bring<s%> it to <S%G4160>pass.<s%>
<S%G80>Brethren,<s%> <S%G4336>pray<s%> for us.
<S%G782>Greet<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brethren<s%> with a <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G5370>kiss.<s%>
I <S%G7072>adjure<s%> you by the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> to have <S%G3588>this<s%> <S%G1992>letter<s%> <S%G314>read<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G80>brethren.<s%>
The <S%G5485>grace<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> be with you.
